interactivity.requirements: 35 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Lesbian Stuff " Seen " Cold Air of an Encroaching Winter " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Best Friends Forever " from Ami Arakawa

progression.synopsis: Osako is unimpressed with Ayane 's lack of activity at the dojo, noting that she has been "not feeling well" for the third weekend in a row. Osako assumes that it's because Sensei is a distraction, but once she has gone, Sensei asks Ayane if she is okay. Eventually, she asks what she can do to make him want her more, and he says that she does more than enough already. She disagrees, saying that while some of the other girls might want him, she needs him. He says that she isn't giving herself enough credit. Ayane changes the subject.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p2.
